content: AC-D DS Drywall stud chop saw blade Drywall track/stud cutting disc for chop saws ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Helps to speed up progress on site – a premium grain and bond system makes these discs cut faster, last longer and more break-resistant Documented safety data – comprehensive datasheets to support compliance with abrasives safety standards available Applications Cutting drywall track and studs to size using chop saws ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Premium Base material: Drywall studs, Drywall Tool type: Chop saw Technical Data | Product Class | Premium | Base material | Drywall studs, Drywall | Tool type | Chop saw | Blade / disc shape | Flat, Type 1 ### ITEMS- 436731 - Cutting disc 12x3/32x1 DS SP - Package Size 10 pc - 436733 - Cutting disc 14x3/32x1 DS SP - Package Size 10 pc
